events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a full refund.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on their message about returning an item and seeking money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative specializing in refunds to provide further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your return and refund for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, the order number is 87654321. The jacket is new, never worn, and still sealed in the original packaging that it came in.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label attached in your order confirmation email.
Thanks! I found the return label and will send the jacket back tomorrow. I appreciate the quick help.
We have received your returned jacket and processed a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow up to 5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund was successful and no further requests were received, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support!
